Patch 4.0:

Greatly improved AI resource mgmt.

Added proper colors to the cities. 

Added dynamic player feedback. 

Other small bug fixes a QOL changes. 


Gameplay Update 4.1:

Added DISCARD WHEN 7 IS ROLLED for players and AI (AI only discards at 10 resources or more. Player at 7 or more.)


Patch 4.2:
Fixed bug with robber not giving the current player a resource from a random enemy on the tile. 

Patch 5.0: FINIAL PATCH

Fixed longest road/ largest army not updating correctly on reload.

Fixed Time Trial bug.

Mutliple QOL changes. 

Finial build for client.
